features: [3 IN 1 MULTI-FUNCTION]This desk lamp comes with energy-saving LED lamp with pen holder and phone holder, which you can use it in 3 different ways with one item. It performs a variety of usage that can help you save money and space.

[3 COLOR MODES AND BRIGHTNESS ADJUSTMENT]This LED desk light features 3 color temperatures and dimmable brightness, which allows you to adjust the light to meet your different needs when reading, studying or working.

[EYE-CARING DESK LAMP]The desk lamp for home office equipped with 56 pcs LED beads that can produce 800 lumens of light. The soft and non-flickering lights can prevent visual fatigue during long-term use, and the high CRI can retain colors more realistically.

[360° FLEXIBLE GOOSENECK ADJUSTMENT]The adjustable desk lamp can 360°adjustable with gooseneck for greater lighting range and flexibility, which allows you to adjust it with ease and to direct the light wherever you want.

[BRIGHTNESS MEMORY FUNCTION]The study desk lamp with brightness memory function always remember the color mode and brightness level last time used. Remember your lighting habits, so you don't need to adjust the brightness again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vicsoon Led Desk Lamp Improves Your Life

Muti-Function Desk Lamp Brings You Convenience Vicsoon study desk lamp comes with energy-saving LED light and pen holder and phone Stand. So you can use it in 3 different ways with one item. It owns a variety of usages that can bring convenience to you.
Previous page Next page 1 3 COLOR MODES 2 ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS 3 EYE-CARING 4 WIDE ILLUMINATION

Details of Vicsoon Desk Lamp LED Light The LED light is soft, stable and non-flickering. The CRI is 90+. It minimizes eye fatigue as well as avoids radiation. Pen Holder The pen holder can store your small items. It helps keep your workspace clean and organized, saving you space and creating a clutter-free environment. Touch Control The button design and the operation is very simple. Short press to adjust the color temperature, long press to adjust the brightness. Flexible Gooseneck The 360°flexible arm can be adjusted to any angle as well as height, which enables you to point your light in the perfect direction you want.
Let Vicsoon Desk Lamp Accompany You This dimmable desk light allows you to adjust the light to meet your different needs when working, reading, studying or drawing.

Does this desk lamp have batteries? Can it be recharged? No, it's not rechargeable, it must be plugged in while using. Why choose Vicsoon? We offer our customers a 2-year free replacement and our team provides 24 hours after-sales service. We have a strong R&D team and a strong supply chain. We attach great importance to customer experience and constantly improve product functions. If there are problems with the product or you have any questions, how to contact Vicsoon? Contact Vicsoon directly on Amazon or enter our brand official website marked on the product label and user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddlers love to play with this lamp.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this lamp for about a month now, and I am very impressed with it.The first thing I love about this lamp is the adjustable gooseneck. It is very flexible, so I can easily position the light to where I need it. This is great for when I am working on different projects, or for when I am reading in bed.The second thing I love about this lamp is the dimmable function. I can adjust the brightness of the light to suit my needs. This is great for when I am working in the evening, or for when I am trying to read in a dark room.The third thing I love about this lamp is the three color modes. I can choose from a warm white light, a cool white light, or a natural light. This is great for when I am working on different tasks, or for when I am trying to create a different mood in my workspace.The fourth thing I love about this lamp is the pen holder. This is a small but very convenient feature. I can now keep my pens and pencils organized, and I don't have to worry about them rolling off my desk.The fifth and final thing I love is that my toddlers will sit and play with the light for a long time, you would think they have no toys.Overall, I am very impressed with the lamp. It is a high-quality lamp with a lot of features. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new desk lamp.Pros:Adjustable gooseneckDimmable functionThree color modesWireless chargerPen holderEnergy-efficient LED lightEye-friendly lightCons:The lamp is a bit bulkyThe touch controls can be a bit sensitive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, stylish, and functional.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Cute, stylish, and functional. This desk lamp has a slim profile so it blends in and the arm is flexible and adjustable for a variety of task surfaces. The adjustable light temp/Kelvin is especially nice when switching from warm tone in the evening to daylight when doing detailed tasks, the touch controls are a bonus. I think it would have been worthwhile to get the lamp with the phone charger in it as this one just has a phone stand on it. Overall, the quality is good and fair for the price. I would recommend this purchase for anyone looking for functional but simple design in a desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This light is so amazing. It has three different light settings and you can choose what’s comfortable for you. There’s also a bonus of the wireless charger that is very suitable while studying. There is a small holder for pens and pencils that is very convenient. I would totally recommend again, and I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and bright
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because there is a dark spot on my desk and it’s hard to see when I’m writing. This lamp is perfect. It has three different colors so if I want to turn off the blue lights I can it is just as pictured and the quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Provides great lighting
reviews.reviewText: I use above my sewing machine to make great light to sew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product-it’s small and has a pen holder. I have it for more than a month, still working. I thought of buying the one with the phone charger-but I think I made the right decision!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for painters
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a reading light but it is bright enough to paint models by! I really like the 3 different colors of the lights. The tough base is great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to my desk. Perfect for me to see to read and write. Great value and price.

This lamp is low light, , small, and totally portable, so perfect for reading in bed. It turns out that it is also very idea to take camping, as a bedside table. It is very lightweight, so I did put a rock in the pencil holder, to keep it sturdy.

This light is perfect on our table near a couch. I bought it because it also has wireless charging. I needed a lamp that had different color settings so it has a more yellow one. I use the storage too, it can hold pens and small items. Overall, very pleased with this little gadget. The stand that holds the light can be adjusted lower and to different angles so you can rotate the light in many different positions.
I use it as a soft light at night time in my office. Its pretty bright and i only use the soft warm color.good purchase
